Reviews.Title: “Worst Customer Service EVER!!!!”
Reviews.Author: MCRANE0603
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to let Fairfield Inn know that my husband and I wil never ever stay at one of your properties ever! He called last night to get a rate of 84 dollars that was listed online. Phillip the GSR on duty who answered said the rate for Sunday night was $99 and there was nothing he could do about it. My husband has worked for Marriott before and he was able to do that as a GSR, why couldn't he? I spoke with Reanna this morning the General Manager of the Fairfield Inn and Suites South in Indianapolis where we called last night and she said she stood behind Phillip and that he didn't have to us a lower rate and that their system wasn't updated yet to give that rate even if it said so online last night. She was absolutely rude, interrupted me several times and hung up on me. I spoke with the Jameson Inn and they were willing to give a good rate for Sunday night. I hope it was worth Marriott losing a customer.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and very clean”
Reviews.Author: mo4049
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with service and clean. Con if one is the breakfast is small but good.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, close to airport and great restaurants”
Reviews.Author: FormerHoosier
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a shopping/dining trip with my fiance. Close to airport and several nice area restaurants. Close to the freeway for easy access. Nice rooms but could use a little updating.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel -- Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: iamzeke
Reviews.Content: Clean, very comfortable hotel. very close to assortment of restaurants within walking distance. Will definitely stay here again next time to Indy area.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Safe, Family hotel - Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: pingmark
Reviews.Content: Restaurants in walking distance. Window air-conditioning unit that remains on. That helps to mute other noise. Looks like a nice place for families on the road, pets are ok. Nothing fancy but comfortable and clean. I would stay here again for a night..

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: markw89311
Reviews.Content: I don't usually stay at Fairfield Inn's - not sure why - but if all of them are like this one, there is no reason not to. Everything was fine, although the towels were kind of thin compared to a Hampton or HI Express. Breakfast was A+. Our room was wrapped around the elevator, but I never heard it.

Reviews.Title: “I'll Be Back!”
Reviews.Author: roadrunner42
Reviews.Content: What a great hotel! Clean, friendly staff, great breakfast, lovely pool, I can't think of one thing that could have been better! I highly recommend this Fairfield! I'll most certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: sss128
Reviews.Content: In town for a wedding, first time at this hotel. Front desk clerk and head of housekeeping were extremely helpful. Rooms were clean and well maintained. Breakfast buffet was OK; nothing special but nothing terrible. Basic room with no frills, completely functional with no surprises. If you are looking for a clean, safe and well-located room, this would be a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean, Great Value!!!”
Reviews.Author: OhioMommy74
Reviews.Content: Rooms were clean, quiet and comfortable. Pool was clean and the hottub was warm. The lady in charge of the breakfast went above and beyond her duties and made chocolate chip waffles for my girls. Would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “hard to find”
Reviews.Author: Kimbmd
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on a business trip. The rooms are clean. There is no fitness room which is some thing I really wish all motels/hotels had. The pool looks nice however. There are several good restaurants withing walking distance. The motel is not well marked, there is no sign directing you to it but as there are several other motels/hotels clustered together it is not very difficult to find.
